original_text: When the affair was investigated and found to be so, the men were both hanged on the gallows. And it was recorded in the book of the chronicles in the presence of the king.
korean_text: 조사하여 실증을 얻었으므로 두 사람을 나무에 달고 그 일을 왕 앞에서 궁중 일기에 기록하니라

sentences.original_text: When the affair was investigated and found to be so,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 일이 조사되어 사실로 드러났을 때,
